Class TriviaCombined

  • java.lang.Object
    • TriviaCombined

  • class TriviaCombined
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the AP Computer Science A program made with the requirements of developing a 1D Array. The resulting program is a Trivia game.
    Since:
    2020-02-28
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Zoe Weiner and Hamadi Belghachi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int correctCount
      The global integer that counts the player's score.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TriviaCombined() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void correctCheck(Draw windowPoints, java.lang.String pAnswer, java.lang.String tAnswer)
      Used to check if the answer is correct, add a point if correct, update the text on windowPoints.
      static java.lang.String[] getRandomQandA(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> questions, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wrongAnswers)
      Used to generate the random question, correct answer, and 3 incorrect answers.
      static void initWindowAnnouncer(Draw wAnnouncer)
      (Method is unused) Used to change the properties of the Announcer window and change background graphics if the answer selected is inccorrect or correct.
      static void initWindowInteractive(Draw windowPoints, Draw wInteractive, java.lang.String[] QandA, Draw windowQuiz, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> questions, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wrongAnswers)
      Used to display the graphics and interactive spaces the player can click on to select and answer.
      static void initWindowPoints(Draw wPoints)
      Used to display graphics and amount of points the player has.
      static void initWindowQuiz(Draw wQuiz, java.lang.String[] QandA)
      Used to display the graphics and question for the player to read.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      The main method that connects every other method together.

      This method is used to run the game.

        public static int correctCount
        The global integer that counts the player's score.

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        The main method that connects every other method together.
        Parameters:
        args - Recieves arguments.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Throws FileNotFoundException if an ANSI formated trivia.txt file is not found in the same directory as the TriviaCombined class file.

      • playGame

        public static void playGame(Draw windowPoints,
                            Draw windowQuiz,
                            Draw windowInteractive,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> questions,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers,
                            java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wrongAnswers)
        This method is used to run the game. Uses an infinite while loop to keep running.
        Parameters:
        windowPoints - Bridges to initWindowPoints to display amount of points on screen
        windowQuiz - Bridges to initWindowQuiz to display question
        windowInteractive - Bridges to initWindowInteractive to recieve input from player and display answers on button
        questions - List of questions.
        answers - List of correct answers.
        wrongAnswers - List of incorrect answers.

      • initWindowAnnouncer

        public static void initWindowAnnouncer(Draw wAnnouncer)
        (Method is unused) Used to change the properties of the Announcer window and change background graphics if the answer selected is inccorrect or correct.
        Parameters:
        wAnnouncer - Connects to Draw windowAnnouncer to edit its window.

      • initWindowQuiz

        public static void initWindowQuiz(Draw wQuiz,
                                  java.lang.String[] QandA)
        Used to display the graphics and question for the player to read.
        Parameters:
        wQuiz - Connects to Draw windowQuiz to edit its window.
        QandA - Corrects to ArrayList QandA to retrieve random question.

      • initWindowPoints

        public static void initWindowPoints(Draw wPoints)
        Used to display graphics and amount of points the player has.
        Parameters:
        wPoints - Connects to Draw windowPoints to edit the window's contents.

      • initWindowInteractive

        public static void initWindowInteractive(Draw windowPoints,
                                         Draw wInteractive,
                                         java.lang.String[] QandA,
                                         Draw windowQuiz,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> questions,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers,
                                         java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wrongAnswers)
        Used to display the graphics and interactive spaces the player can click on to select and answer.
        Parameters:
        windowPoints - Bridges to initWindowPoints to display amount of points on screen.
        wInteractive - Connects to Draw windowInteractive to modify window's contents.
        windowQuiz - Bridges to initWindowQuiz to display question
        QandA - Retrieves 1 random question, 1 random correct answer, and 3 incorrect answers.
        questions - List of questions.
        answers - List of correct answers.
        wrongAnswers - List of incorrect answers.

      • getRandomQandA

        public static java.lang.String[] getRandomQandA(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> questions,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> answers,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> wrongAnswers)
        Used to generate the random question, correct answer, and 3 incorrect answers.
        Parameters:
        questions - List of questions.
        answers - List of correct answers.
        wrongAnswers - List of incorrect answers.
        Returns:
        QandA returns random question, answer, and incorrect answers to the ArrayList QandA.

      • correctCheck

        public static void correctCheck(Draw windowPoints,
                                java.lang.String pAnswer,
                                java.lang.String tAnswer)
        Used to check if the answer is correct, add a point if correct, update the text on windowPoints.
        Parameters:
        windowPoints - Bridges to initWindowPoints to display amount of points on screen.
        pAnswer - Recieves an answer from initWindowInteractive.
        tAnswer - Recieves the correct answer from QandA.
